pull.title: fuzz: Add fuzzer for ConditionStack
pull.body: This takes the ConditionStack from d0e8f4d5d8ddaccb37f98b7989fb944081e41ab8 and e6e622e5a0e22c2ac1b50b96af818e412d67ac54 and checks that they behave equally with a fuzz test.

events.message: Benchmark script verification with 100 nested IFs

[refactor] interpreter: define interface for vfExec

Includes comments added by Pieter Wuille.

Implement O(1) OP_IF/NOTIF/ELSE/ENDIF logic

This optimization was first suggested by Sergio Demian Lerner in
https://bitslog.wordpress.com/2017/04/17/new-quadratic-delays-in-bitcoin-scripts/.
The implementation follows the suggested approach there, but with a slightly
simpler representation.

fuzz: Add fuzzer for ConditionStack

events.body: Concept ACK: thanks for adding fuzzing harnesses. Nice to see the new PR title prefix `fuzz:` :)
Concept ACK - I take it you don't mean for this to be merged but rather to prove the point?

Concept ACK, tested
